QuestData.Title: Tarenar Sunstrike
QuestData.Description: As soon as we stopped, they made a bet about "who could kill the most undead in five minutes."$b$bIt's been an hour, and I'm still waiting for them to come back.$b$bI saw Tarenar run off to the southeast. Unfortunately, I can't leave the caravan here by itself. If you end up traveling in that direction, could you find him and send him back to me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Tarenar Sunstrike at Death's Step in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: I've found them, $r. The Scourge. How I've longed for this day.
